readable.title: 488408004_a1e26d4886
readable.content: A child in formal clothing is walking along the edge of a stony area that is littered in places . A little boy with a blue jacket is making a sour face at the camera . A young boy wearing a light blue jacket walks across the brick patio . A young boy with a blue coat makes a funny face as he walks towards the grass . The young boy is walking wearing a blue jacket , a black sweater and white collared shirt .
